data.text:
DAYTIME EVENTS ARE ALL-AGES // AFTER 8PM WE ARE 21+ // ALL SHOWS END BY 11PM SHARP (NOISE CURFEW) // ADMISSION IS CA$H ONLY AT THE DOOR // BAR ACCEPTS ALL PAYMENT TYPES FOR FOOD&BEVS // NO ADVANCE TICKETS—THANK YOU!!

T3 EVENTS FAQ

How much is tonight’s show?

Short answer: Most of the time, We don’t know!

Longer answer: Turn! Turn! Turn! Promotes a Do-It-Yourself esthetic. We ask that performers build their own bills, do their own promotion, set the price for the event and figure out their money split. We believe this approach helps promote a music-community mindset, rather than a venue/performer divide.

In practice, details are often worked out day-of the event, so we often don’t know ahead of time how much the cover charge will be. Performers set the price for their shows and this is often determined after they all arrive at the venue. We encourage a sliding scale, $5~20, and this is generally what you should expect to pay.

How much do the bands make at Turn!?

Performers take home 100% of the door money after the door person is paid. The more you give at the door, the more the bands get! The bar takes $0.00 from the door.

Can I pay with a credit card/phone/subdermal micro-chip?

Admissions to the event is CASH ONLY. This makes it easy for us to pass the money directly to the performers at the end of the event. There are ATMs within walking distance of the venue.

What about my beer and nachos?

The bar accepts all payment types for food and drink. This is how the venue covers ALL of its operating expenses. The more regularly you eat and drink at Turn!, the more likely we will still be here doing this for you next year!

With love and gratitude, we hope this FAQ has been illuminating.

Thanks for reading!

XO!T3
